Subject: Email Notification
Description: Hello Support, Happy Friday!! It seems that some of our scanning jobs on STEALTHAudit are failing, and we do not have an email notification in place to let us know when a scanning job fails. We need to create an email alert that will let us know when a scanning job has failed. I would like to work with your Tech Support to create an email notification that will alert us when that occurs. Thank you. Respectfully, James Monteria | Network Security Specialist | Virginia Lottery 600 East Main Street, Richmond, VA 23219 PH: +1 804-692-7221 JMonteria@VALOTTERY.COM
Solution_Comment__c: Scottie reviewed the configuration for email delivery in STEALTHAudit which had been set up. I was able to verify that the email notifications were being delivered. We can close this ticket.
